thread.section_title: The Montcalm London Marble Arch - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A modern luxury.
thread.title_full: A modern luxury. - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Danny K
title: A modern luxury.
text:
A really comfortable hotel in an amazing location. It's definitely worth taking a club room to get the perks of the club suite on the top floor. The spa is exquisite, and with a full working gym this business hotel is way above par.
Very friendly and welcoming staff will help with any questions you might have.
The location is of course quite special, only 2 blocks away from Selfridges.
Would stay again.
Room Tip: Low floors have thinner walls. See more room tips
